EmailTemplate.subject: St Andrew's Cathedral School: Tour Booking Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName}
I am writing to confirm that you are attending our {!Lead.School_Tour_Date__c} at 9.00am, Ground Floor, St Andrew's House, Sydney Square, Sydney (opposite the main entrance to St Andrew's Cathedral - refer map attached). You will be greeted by our staff in the Foyer on arrival.
Tea, coffee and refreshments will be served from 8.45am.
The tour commences at 9.00am with a welcome from our Head of School, Dr Collier, followed by a tour of the School facilities at both St Andrew's House and our Senior College on Druitt Street.
It is anticipated that the tour will conclude by 10.30am.
To assist in the organisation of the tour, could you please advise:
1. Names and number of people attending;
2. If you will be attending with small children or a stroller;
3. Academic Year and Calendar Year you are considering for your child;
4. How you found out about St Andrewâ€™s Cathedral School; and
5. Anything you would like covered on the talk or tour.
Please note it is important that you confirm your attendance.
Kindest regards
Robyn Pedley Enrolments Administrative Assistant
St Andrew's Cathedral School
Sydney Square, Sydney NSW 2000, Australia
